artist: Maker: Carle Vernet; Engraver: Louis-Philibert Debucourt
creditline:
The Minnich Collection

dimension: 12 3/8 x 9 5/8 in. (31.43 x 24.45 cm) (image, irregular, without attached title panel)
markings: Title, location and attribution of engraver and publisher, on bottom (Seems to have been cut from print and attached to drawing)
portfolio: From No. 5, of the first issue of a collection of costumes drawn "after nature," Paris, (1814-1824)
title: Adieux d'un Russe à une Parisienne
